variables.joinQuery:
WITH Joined AS ( 
   SELECT
    -- Vowpal Wabbit JSON ignores _ prefixed variables 
    interaction.EventId _EventId, 
    interaction.PartitionId _PartitionId, 
    -- Action
    CASE
     WHEN TRY_CAST(interaction.a as array) IS NULL THEN interaction.a -- policy
     ELSE GetArrayElement(interaction.a, 0) -- ranking
    END _label_Action,
    -- Cost
    CASE  
     WHEN observation IS NULL THEN 1 -- default cost
     ELSE -1 * observation.v -- insert custom reward function using ASA SQL, JavaScript or AzureML
    END _label_Cost,
    -- Probability   
    CASE
     WHEN interaction.ProbabilityOfDrop IS NULL THEN interaction.p -- take care of queue overload
     ELSE interaction.p * (1 - interaction.ProbabilityOfDrop)
    END _label_Probability,
    CASE
     WHEN TRY_CAST(interaction.a as array) IS NULL THEN null
     ELSE GetArrayElement(interaction.a, 0) - 1
    END _labelIndex,
    interaction.c.*
   FROM interaction TIMESTAMP BY EventEnqueuedUtcTime PARTITION BY PartitionId
   -- always output interaction events, regardless if there is an observation or not
   LEFT OUTER JOIN
   -- shift observation time line before interaction (thus interaction comes later)
   -- the output event timestamp is defined as the maximum of (interaction event, observation event) --> always interaction event timestamp
    observation TIMESTAMP BY DATEADD(Microsecond, -$ExperimentalDurationInMicrosecond$, EventEnqueuedUtcTime) PARTITION BY PartitionId
   -- MUST use Microsecond due to rounding issue in DATEDIFF, otherwise observation events are moved forward by 1 time unit
   -- Allow for early observation events up to 10 minutes
        ON DATEDIFF(Microsecond, observation, interaction) BETWEEN 0 AND 600000000 + $ExperimentalDurationInMicrosecond$ 
        AND interaction.EventId = observation.EventId
        AND interaction.PartitionId = observation.PartitionId
)
 
SELECT * INTO outHubStream FROM Joined PARTITION BY _PartitionId 
SELECT * INTO outBlob FROM Joined PARTITION BY _PartitionId
